##Pay The workers at Mount Thor: On the first day of work, $50 million has come down | prism

Micro-signal Lengjing

Feature Introduction, tencent news product column, "Prism" focus on financial in-depth reports.

By Wang Xiao, editor | Yang Hao
Production | prism tencent Xiaoman studio

Welcome to download tencent news APP for more quality information

"[ the settlement ] was very timely and efficient, reducing the pressure on our company to make cash advances when undertaking projects, " Xiong Lijie, general manager of Hubei Hengqi Construction and Decoration Engineering Co. , Ltd. , told prism on Feb. 10. On this day, as participating in the Fire Mountain, Raytheon Mountain hospital partition ceiling decoration units, they received the project payment, this time only three days from their completion of the project.

The HUOSHENSHAN and Leishenshan hospitals built in 10 days are the result of the cooperation of many subcontractors and individuals.

Taking the Huoshenshan hospital project as an example, according to the introduction of the Wuhan Branch of the Pudong Development Bank, the general contractor, China Construction Bureau 3, has nearly 300 million yuan in capital settlement for the cooperating units (including Labor Service Companies, subcontractors, suppliers, etc.) , the timely transfer of funds is very important to guarantee the construction period. Therefore, Pudong Development Bank Wuhan Branch in the Third Bureau of the construction of the task that night to agree on the emergency plan, with the support of the head office to optimize the online banking payment channels and business acceptance rules, so that the online banking holidays can also be real-time acceptance of large business; At the same time in the back-office Operations Center and landed business arrangements for the protection of personnel, to ensure that the final deadline for completion.

This outbreak of sniping war, medical, infrastructure, transport and other industries co-operation, financial institutions to smooth the payment of funds, clearing and credit channels as the main goal, in the rear launched a different financial "war epidemic. ".

Since the New Year's Eve

According to Xiong Lijie recalled, the company is in the New Year's Day, first received the Wuhan Guanggu Three Hospital Ward emergency transformation task. It was New Year's Eve, in contact with the seven or eight engineering team after no result, Xiong Lijie sent in the circle of friends finally waiting for a message reply: "need to contact me. "

The message is called Xu Huaming, when people are still in Hubei Province Huanggang Qichun County home.

"To leave a message at that time means to give up the reunion with your family and go back to the place where the epidemic is at its worst. You can't do that without a little bit of national pride. "Xiong Lijie is still deeply moved. But Xu huaming soon found three fellow villagers, from a hundred miles away in Huanggang chartered car rushed to Wuhan. At that time, many workers are also at home to eat reunion dinner.

On January 23, while Xu huaming and others completed the renovation of the Guanggu three hospitals overnight, Wuhan decided to build the Huoshenshan hospital in Caidian District with China Construction Group taking the lead of China Construction Corporation's China Construction Third Bureau, a Chinese enterprise.

"recruit workers. Urgent! Urgent! Urgent! " Almost at the same time, Xiong Lijie and other subcontractors have received China Construction Bureau three about the Fire Mountain Hospital project to recruit construction workers. "The China Construction Bureau did not specify how many people each engineering team should provide, but we are all doing our best to mobilize and recruit workers, " Xiong said. "everyone feels that this is a mission. "

So, the first day of the New Year, just completed Xu huaming and others quickly participated in the construction of the Fire Mountain Hospital. Due to the shortage of manpower, they have to work overtime every day, "three shifts around the clock, the pace is very fast. ".

After the delivery of the Fire Mountain Hospital, on February 6, Xiong Lijie's company received the urgent construction task of the Thunder Mountain Hospital. Xiong did his best to arrange more than 30 construction and management personnel, and completed the construction of the ceiling and partition of the sub-contracting area of the Raytheon Mountain project in two days and two nights.

"More than 20 professional hydropower teams were contacted to the scene today, and the project is expected to be completed in the afternoon and evening, " Xiong told prism on the 10th.

On the first day of the Lunar New Year, 50 million remittances were made through three levels of linkage

Up to the count, Xiong Lijie around for the fire God mountain, Thunder God Mountain Hospital Construction Organization of nearly 50 construction personnel. While the construction of the fire and Split Second hospitals, with a total of nearly 15,000 workers, is not particularly impressive, each builder is crucial as the construction of the hospital is rushed forward.

Although a number of workers told the media that they did not participate in the two projects for their salaries, everyone from the general contractor to Xiong knows that the workers who are risking overtime at this moment will pay their salaries in time, is One of our top priorities.

According to Xiong Lijie, according to the rules, workers are paid the same day, advance by subcontractors, the total package will be settled later. With the 10-day settlement of nearly 300 million yuan, including wages, the settlement of the construction site should reach tens of millions of yuan per day.

But unlike usual, it was the Spring Festival holiday and the banks were still on holiday.

On the first day of the Lunar New Year (January 25) , the first day of the construction of the Huoshenshan Hospital, the China Construction and Construction Bureau urgently needed to remit 50 million yuan to cover the construction costs of the hospital, but this sum of money could not be remitted. In accordance with the Agricultural Bank after the resumption, because the holiday period large-sum system is not open, the unit can be transferred through the Enterprise Network Bank. During the Spring Festival, the People's Bank of China (PBOC) relaxed the small-sum payment limit to 500 million yuan, and the Agricultural Bank of China (ABC) also made corresponding changes.

When the Third Bureau of China Construction failed to report the online money transfer to ABC, four employees of the Agricultural Bank of Kong Hon Xunlimen sub-branch of Wuhan rushed to the branch from Qingshan, Hanyang and other places in Wuhan to handle the transaction, and later found out that it was the online bank quota issue. Therefore, the branch immediately feedback to Wuhan Branch, Wuhan Branch Operation Supervisor immediately contact the provincial branch back-office center, provincial science and technology departments, found that the right to change in the head office, and urgently contact the head office of Science and Technology Department for Revision. Finally in the main branch of the three-level linkage to complete the timely transfer of funds.

As a result, on the first day of construction, the subcontractors received the payment from the Third Bureau of CCCC and paid off the workers in time.

"The construction of the two major hospitals affects the hearts of the people across the country, and we are the first to organize manpower and allocate funds to ensure that the construction progress is not delayed, " the Ministry of Science and Technology of Agricultural Bank of China told prism.

The construction enterprise of "Fire Thunder God mountain" aided by credit

In order to prevent soil and water from being polluted by viruses, anti-seepage work is very important in hospital construction. Beijing East Rain Rainbow Waterproof Technology Co. , Ltd. is involved in the Fire God mountain, Thunder God Mountain Hospital Project Waterproof Seepage Engineering Construction. During the period, more than 4,000 workers work in double shifts, and 100 large machines are involved in the construction round-the-clock. East Yuhong brothers high energy environment is also involved in the construction of the Huoshenshan Hospital, to undertake 30,000 square meters of anti-seepage works, and to provide materials and related services.

Construction period is short, the task is urgent, make the enterprise of engineering construction bear more pressure of capital advance payment. Prism learned from Minsheng Bank that before the Spring Festival, the Beijing Branch of Minsheng Bank has granted a total of 390 million yuan in loans to the two enterprises, easing the pressure on capital advances. According to the Beijing branch of Minsheng Bank, it is coordinating credit resources within the bank, and intends to provide additional credit support of 200 million yuan for Dongfang Yuhong, and reduce the financing costs of enterprises through domestic letters of credit to support their production, operation and construction work.

Beijing Yi'an Medical System Co. , Ltd. is mainly responsible for providing breathing system solutions for Vulcan Mountain and Thor Mountain hospitals. Affected by the epidemic, in addition to the Vulcan Mountain, Raytheon Mountain equipment requirements, hospitals around the short-term increase in new orders. In order to ensure the demand for epidemic prevention, the company has been ahead of schedule to resume production, but in the procurement of raw materials in urgent need of capital turnover. Minsheng Bank Beijing branch contact to understand the needs of enterprises, in the early 10 million yuan of secured loans on the basis of an emergency increase of 10 million yuan of guarantee-free credit line.

The cable supply for the hospital was provided by Jiangsu Baosheng Technology, after Agricultural Bank of China's Yangzhou branch lent 280m yuan to meet corporate demand.

In addition to the Fire Mountain, Raytheon Mountain Hospital construction enterprises, a number of medical materials enterprises to resume work, the banking financial institutions of the epidemic prevention and control enterprises financing needs also opened a green channel. According to the China Banking Association, as of noon on February 11, the total amount of support provided by banking and financial institutions for the prevention and control of the epidemic and the provision of credit support by enterprises for the resumption of production had exceeded 349 billion yuan.

A number of banks to roll over the small and medium-sized enterprise loan policy

Let Xiong Lijie feel relieved, but also not only the rapid return of the project. He told prism that the company took out a loan with equal principal and interest last year at the Hubei Bank. Recently, he received a phone call from the bank, telling him that if there was pressure to pay back the loan, he could apply for a loan extension, interest will be refunded during the extension period.

Affected by the epidemic, some small and medium-sized enterprises operating income sharp decline in short-term cash flow pressure. As a result, a number of banks affected by the epidemic of small and medium-sized enterprises, but also introduced a loan extension or support related policies.

The Exim Bank of China has announced that it will exempt small, medium and micro enterprises in Hubei Province and other wholesale, retail and logistics industries affected by the epidemic from interest charges on their loans in February, involving loans of nearly 160 billion yuan, with an interest waiver of about 600 million yuan.

Zhejiang Commercial Bank has explicitly set February 3,2020, to March 20,2020 as a policy grace period (subject to change in time) . During the period affected by the epidemic, small and micro enterprises in related industries can not normally repay the overdue loans, without penalty interest and compound interest, and does not affect credit reporting records. In addition, there is no need to return the principal to the small and micro enterprises in the wholesale and retail, accommodation and catering, cultural tourism, transportation, residential services and other sectors affected by the epidemic that meet the relevant conditions and whose credits expire before June 30,2020, automatic System Review for active renewal up to one year.

On February 11, the Agricultural Bank also made it clear that customers who are unable to repay their overdue loans due to the delayed resumption of work will be deferred to the earliest resumption date stipulated by the provincial government. The period will not be counted as overdue loans and will not be compounded with penalty interest. For those customers who have difficulty in repayment but have prospects for development, we can provide them with grace period, extension period, non-repayment loan, medium-and long-term loan and so on.

Xiong told prism that the company should have paid one million yuan in taxes and hundreds of thousands of yuan in wages in February. As the company's main projects are in Wuhan, affected by the epidemic part of the construction project suspended, many accounts receivable due to party a unit has not yet received the resumption of work, the pressure is greater. However, the Hubei Provincial Tax Bureau has issued a policy to extend the February tax filing deadline to March 6, and can apply for a further extension if there are still difficulties affected by the epidemic.

"these policies can greatly relieve our short-term pressure. We just hope the epidemic can be over soon, " Xiong said.

By Wang Xiao, editor | Yang Hao

Since the New Year's Eve

"Xiong Lijie is still deeply moved. But Xu huaming soon found three fellow villagers, from a hundred miles away in Huanggang chartered car rushed to Wuhan. Finally in the main branch of the three-level linkage to complete the timely transfer of funds.

The construction enterprise of "Fire Thunder God mountain" aided by credit

In order to prevent soil and water from being polluted by viruses, anti-seepage work is very important in hospital construction. Beijing East Rain Rainbow Waterproof Technology Co. , Ltd. is involved in the Fire God mountain, Thunder God Mountain Hospital Project Waterproof Seepage Engineering Construction. During the period, more than 4,000 workers work in double shifts, and 100 large machines are involved in the construction round-the-clock. East Yuhong brothers high energy environment is also involved in the construction of the Huoshenshan Hospital, to undertake 30,000 square meters of anti-seepage works, and to provide materials and related services.

Construction period is short, the task is urgent, make the enterprise of engineering construction bear more pressure of capital advance payment. Prism learned from Minsheng Bank that before the Spring Festival, the Beijing Branch of Minsheng Bank has granted a total of 390 million yuan in loans to the two enterprises, easing the pressure on capital advances. According to the Beijing branch of Minsheng Bank, it is coordinating credit resources within the bank, and intends to provide additional credit support of 200 million yuan for Dongfang Yuhong, and reduce the financing costs of enterprises through domestic letters of credit to support their production, operation and construction work.

Beijing Yi'an Medical System Co. , Ltd. is mainly responsible for providing breathing system solutions for Vulcan Mountain and Thor Mountain hospitals. Affected by the epidemic, in addition to the Vulcan Mountain, Raytheon Mountain equipment requirements, hospitals around the short-term increase in new orders. In order to ensure the demand for epidemic prevention, the company has been ahead of schedule to resume production, but in the procurement of raw materials in urgent need of capital turnover. Minsheng Bank Beijing branch contact to understand the needs of enterprises, in the early 10 million yuan of secured loans on the basis of an emergency increase of 10 million yuan of guarantee-free credit line.

The cable supply for the hospital was provided by Jiangsu Baosheng Technology, after Agricultural Bank of China's Yangzhou branch lent 280m yuan to meet corporate demand.

In addition to the Fire Mountain, Raytheon Mountain Hospital construction enterprises, a number of medical materials enterprises to resume work, the banking financial institutions of the epidemic prevention and control enterprises financing needs also opened a green channel. According to the China Banking Association, as of noon on February 11, the total amount of support provided by banking and financial institutions for the prevention and control of the epidemic and the provision of credit support by enterprises for the resumption of production had exceeded 349 billion yuan.

In addition to the Fire Mountain, Raytheon Mountain Hospital construction enterprises, a number of medical materials enterprises to resume work, the banking financial institutions of the epidemic prevention and control enterprises financing needs also opened a green channel. According to the China Banking Association, as of noon on February 11, the total amount of support provided by banking and financial institutions for the prevention and control of the epidemic and the provision of credit support by enterprises for the resumption of production had exceeded 349 billion yuan.

A number of banks to roll over the small and medium-sized enterprise loan policy

Let Xiong Lijie feel relieved, but also not only the rapid return of the project. He told prism that the company took out a loan with equal principal and interest last year at the Hubei Bank. Recently, he received a phone call from the bank, telling him that if there was pressure to pay back the loan, he could apply for a loan extension, interest will be refunded during the extension period.

Affected by the epidemic, some small and medium-sized enterprises operating income sharp decline in short-term cash flow pressure. As a result, a number of banks affected by the epidemic of small and medium-sized enterprises, but also introduced a loan extension or support related policies.

The Exim Bank of China has announced that it will exempt small, medium and micro enterprises in Hubei Province and other wholesale, retail and logistics industries affected by the epidemic from interest charges on their loans in February, involving loans of nearly 160 billion yuan, with an interest waiver of about 600 million yuan.

Zhejiang Commercial Bank has explicitly set February 3,2020, to March 20,2020 as a policy grace period (subject to change in time) . During the period affected by the epidemic, small and micro enterprises in related industries can not normally repay the overdue loans, without penalty interest and compound interest, and does not affect credit reporting records. In addition, there is no need to return the principal to the small and micro enterprises in the wholesale and retail, accommodation and catering, cultural tourism, transportation, residential services and other sectors affected by the epidemic that meet the relevant conditions and whose credits expire before June 30,2020, automatic System Review for active renewal up to one year.

On February 11, the Agricultural Bank also made it clear that customers who are unable to repay their overdue loans due to the delayed resumption of work will be deferred to the earliest resumption date stipulated by the provincial government. The period will not be counted as overdue loans and will not be compounded with penalty interest. For those customers who have difficulty in repayment but have prospects for development, we can provide them with grace period, extension period, non-repayment loan, medium-and long-term loan and so on.

Xiong told prism that the company should have paid one million yuan in taxes and hundreds of thousands of yuan in wages in February. As the company's main projects are in Wuhan, affected by the epidemic part of the construction project suspended, many accounts receivable due to party a unit has not yet received the resumption of work, the pressure is greater. However, the Hubei Provincial Tax Bureau has issued a policy to extend the February tax filing deadline to March 6, and can apply for a further extension if there are still difficulties affected by the epidemic.

"these policies can greatly relieve our short-term pressure. We just hope the epidemic can be over soon, " Xiong said.

Let Xiong Lijie feel relieved, but also not only the rapid return of the project. He told prism that the company took out a loan with equal principal and interest last year at the Hubei Bank. Recently, he received a phone call from the bank, telling him that if there was pressure to pay back the loan, he could apply for a loan extension, interest will be refunded during the extension period.

Affected by the epidemic, some small and medium-sized enterprises operating income sharp decline in short-term cash flow pressure. As a result, a number of banks affected by the epidemic of small and medium-sized enterprises, but also introduced a loan extension or support related policies.

The Exim Bank of China has announced that it will exempt small, medium and micro enterprises in Hubei Province and other wholesale, retail and logistics industries affected by the epidemic from interest charges on their loans in February, involving loans of nearly 160 billion yuan, with an interest waiver of about 600 million yuan.

Zhejiang Commercial Bank has explicitly set February 3,2020, to March 20,2020 as a policy grace period (subject to change in time) . During the period affected by the epidemic, small and micro enterprises in related industries can not normally repay the overdue loans, without penalty interest and compound interest, and does not affect credit reporting records. In addition, there is no need to return the principal to the small and micro enterprises in the wholesale and retail, accommodation and catering, cultural tourism, transportation, residential services and other sectors affected by the epidemic that meet the relevant conditions and whose credits expire before June 30,2020, automatic System Review for active renewal up to one year.

On February 11, the Agricultural Bank also made it clear that customers who are unable to repay their overdue loans due to the delayed resumption of work will be deferred to the earliest resumption date stipulated by the provincial government. The period will not be counted as overdue loans and will not be compounded with penalty interest. For those customers who have difficulty in repayment but have prospects for development, we can provide them with grace period, extension period, non-repayment loan, medium-and long-term loan and so on.

Xiong told prism that the company should have paid one million yuan in taxes and hundreds of thousands of yuan in wages in February. As the company's main projects are in Wuhan, affected by the epidemic part of the construction project suspended, many accounts receivable due to party a unit has not yet received the resumption of work, the pressure is greater. However, the Hubei Provincial Tax Bureau has issued a policy to extend the February tax filing deadline to March 6, and can apply for a further extension if there are still difficulties affected by the epidemic.

"these policies can greatly relieve our short-term pressure. We just hope the epidemic can be over soon, " Xiong said.
